title: I want to apply for a scholarship in Korean, so what should I do and what kind of scholarship should I apply for if I don't know Korean? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are a lot of scholarship opportunities in South Korea. If you are looking for Graduate then visit some universities website and search for the relevant professor and his research area and send him an email about your qualifications and ask him,if he has any vacant position in his research group. Thats' how i got the scholarship for my master studies. Other then this there is Korean Govt. Scholarship program (KGSP). If you are applying for undergrad studies then KGSP is your best bet. The prerequisites for getting a schlarship in Korea is that you must have atleast good grades in your previous degree program and also good scores in English proficiency test.
May be you can get some useful info from my blog:Scholarships in Korea | TOPIK GUIDE Good Luck!
